body:
Hey, 
I was just wondering if the upcoming Tournament is planned to be streamed on platforms like Twitch or HitBox? It might be cool to bring a bunch of commentators to live comment on the games. 
This will be the first tournament that I will see, so I don't know if this has already been set up or is planning to be. Moreover this also could be used as a promotional strategy to bring in more players to the community (just a suggestion) - haven't seen that being done yet on Minecraft streams. 

Thanks
Regards
-hera

title: Tournament Streams?

replies.body:
Yes. Our medias are going to stream the tourney, either on their channels, or on avicus official channel. (Twitch)
You can check who has this rank in https://avicus.net/staff.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
The tournament will be (hopefully) fully covered, there is a Media team ready to stream/record every match.

Edit: Tom too fast for me

replies.body: Expect a full post about this tournament's streams very soon...

replies.body: My channel is soccermaster89 on twitch. I will be streaming in this tourney and hopefully commentating matches with some other media ranks. So to answer your question, the tourney will be streamed with every match available to watch.

replies.body: As Spoookeh said there will be a post within the next few days with all the streamers links and match recorders links aswell.
